apihelp-shortenurl-summary: Shorten a long URL into a shorter one.
apihelp-shortenurl-param-qrcode: Get a QR code. The linked URL will only be shortened if it is very long.
apierror-urlshortener-disabled: No new short urls may be created
apierror-urlshortener-permissiondenied: You do not have the right to create short urls
